casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. HARGROVE
v.
FIRST DIST. COURT OF APPEALS 2018-0844 Supreme Court of Ohio. September 26, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

In Mandamus. On respondents' motions to dismiss. Motions granted. Cause dismissed. O'Connor, C.J., and O'Donnell, Kennedy, French, DeWine, and DeGenaro, JJ., concur. Fischer, J., not participating.
